feedback.bannerText: My studies provides an overview on your courses. Your feedback helps us to improve the service.
My teaching provides an overview on your courses. Your feedback helps us to improve the service.

mobileNavigation.shortcutsDescription: Email, Flamma, Moodle, Library, Contact information

weekFeed.studentHelpText:
Now in my studies shows the courses and examinations for which you have registered in WebOodi. There are three tabs: timetable, courses, and exams. My studies displays the tab that remained open the last time you visited the page. Clicking the course name will direct you the course page.

Please note that every course does not yet have a course page.

Please note that your registration information will be updated within two hours.
weekFeed.teacherHelpText:
Now in my teaching shows the courses and examinations for which you have registered in WebOodi. There are three tabs: timetable, teaching, and exams. My teaching displays the tab that remained open the last time you visited the page. Clicking the course name will direct you to your course page if one has been generated.

Please note that your registration information will be updated within two hours.
weekFeed.courseMaterialsMoodleHelp: You will find the possible enrolment key by logging into the course page
weekFeed.optimeInstructions: The link above fetches your teaching schedule from Optime. For now, My teaching displays all the events of your courses.
weekFeed.calendarInstructions: How to import events to calendar applications

attainments.seeMoreLink: See a list of your completed studies in WebOodi
attainments.noAttainmentsYet: You don't yet have any completed studies
attainments.noAttainmentsFromLastSixMonths: No completed studies found from the last six months

usefulLinks.title: useful information
usefulLinks.helpText: Useful links are recommended to you based on your student or teacher status and your faculty. If you are a teacher and a student, you will see the links offered to teachers. You can remove and links by pressing Edit. Links will be displayed in the order you added them.

favorites.title: favorites
favorites.helpText: You can add rss feeds, links, and Unicafe lunch menu to favorites. Add a new favorite by clicking +-button in Add new box. Favourites can be organized in Edit mode simply by dragging then to a new spot and removed by clicking the blue cross in the top right hand corner of the specific favorite item. Remember to press Done to save the changes.

unisport.authorizationRequired: Unisport Favourite displays your bookings. The booking information will not be saved nor handed over to third parties. Please go to Unisport site and give permission to the disclosure of your booking information.

errors.genericError: Service has some problems at the moment. Some features may not work.

globalMessages.demoEnvNoticeMyStudies: Notice! This is a demo environment and the information is not correct. For the correct information go to http://student.helsinki.fi
globalMessages.demoEnvNoticeMyTeaching: Notice! This is a demo environment and the information is not correct. For the correct information go to http://teacher.helsinki.fi

todoItems.heading: To do list
todoItems.listIsEmpty: Your to do list is empty
todoItems.helpText: Add a new to do item by writing it into the text box and clicking the +-button. Mark the item as done or remove it with the icons on the right side of the item.

officeHours.title: Consultation hours
officeHours.intro: Choose the right degree programme(s) and publish your consultation hours. Any changes you make will be automatically updated to the published consultation hours.
officeHours.dialogIntro: Choose the right degree programme(s) and publish your consultation hours. If you teach at the Language Centre, select the language(s) you teach.
officeHours.heading: published consultation hours

expiration.mandatory: (mandatory, up to one year from this date)
expiration.info: After the expiration date, the consultation hours will no longer be displayed in the Instructions for Students.

placeholder.additionalInfo: For example blog or website address

errors.loadingError: Consultation hours could not be loaded

accessDenied.title: access denied
accessDenied.description: your account does not have access to this page.

maintenance.title: under maintenance
maintenance.description: We are growing new features! The page is currently under maintenance.

login.title: Welcome to My Studies
login.intro: My Studies is where you are. It is your own page for courses, interesting content, and other services offered by the University.
login.alternativeLogin: If you are a teacher at the University of Helsinki, please login to My Teaching.

login.title: Welcome to My Teaching
login.intro: My Teaching is where you are. It is your own page for courses, interesting content, and other services offered by the University.
login.alternativeLogin: If you are a student at the University of Helsinki, please login to My Studies.
